{variant.name}_{category.name}.long_description: {variant}. 5-year ACS estimates in provided census geolevels. For non-census geolevels (such as zip codes), spatial overlaps are calculated between census block groups and {category}. Redistribution to non-census geolevels was performed using the redistribute R package.

sources.name: American Community Survey
sources.location: 5-Year estimates, table B01001, via the API

parcels.long_description: parcels, then the value of each block group is divided across all living units within each intersecting parcel. Once parcel-level values are assigned, spatial overlaps are calculated between parcels and target regions such that parcel values can be aggregated to each intersecting target region based on proportion of overlap.

direct.long_description: target regions, then the value of each block group is aggregated/disaggregated to any intersecting target region based on proportion of overlap.

pop_under_20.short_description: The population estimates under age 20 using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
pop_under_20.long_description: The population estimates under age 20 using {category.name}-method.
pop_under_20.statement: The population under age 20 is {value} in {region_name}.

pop_20_64.short_description: The population estimates between age 20 and 64 using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
pop_20_64.long_description: The population estimates between age 20 and 64 using {category.name}-method.
pop_20_64.statement: The population between age 20 and 64 is {value} in {region_name}.

pop_65_plus.short_description: The population over age 64 using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
pop_65_plus.statement: The population over age 64 is {value} in {region_name}.

perc_pop_under_20.default: percent of the population under age 20
perc_pop_under_20.short_description: The percent of the population under age 20 using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
perc_pop_under_20.long_description: The percent of the population under age 20 using {category.name}-method.
perc_pop_under_20.statement: The percent of the population under age 20 is {value} in {region_name}.

perc_pop_20_64.default: percent of the population between age 20 and 64
perc_pop_20_64.short_description: The percent of the population over age 64 using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
perc_pop_20_64.long_description: The percent of the population over age 64 using {category.name}-method.
perc_pop_20_64.statement: The percent of the population over age 64 is {value} in {region_name}.

perc_pop_65_plus.default: percent of the population over age 64
perc_pop_65_plus.short_description: The percent of the population over age 64 using {category.name}-method. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
perc_pop_65_plus.long_description: The percent of the population over age 64 using {category.name}-method.
perc_pop_65_plus.statement: The percent of the population over age 64 is {value} in {region_name}.

total_pop.short_description: Total count of the population using {category.name}-model. Based on American Community Survey ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
total_pop.long_description: Total count of the population using {category.name}-model.
total_pop.statement: Total count of the population is {value} in {region_name}.
